channel.title: Need variable help! PLZ!
channel.description:
ive seen tons of people post on this matter and ive tried tons of tut's but its just not working! i have JDK 6 update 6 i've re-installed it just now for the 4rth time but thats didnt fix it ive tried tons of difern't varibles that people said should work but sofar nothing has when i compile the server it says that i need to get JDK 5.0 or 6.0 or higher and to go to mod thoraks tut on this site. i already have JDK so why does it say i need to dowload it? ive tried other JDK versions besides 6 update 6 but still no luck. I know its fully installed i dowload the installer then folowed there instructions like everyomne said then registered the program online and the sun website. these are what im currently useing for variables inside quotes...
PATH:: "C:\Program Files\Sun\JavaDB"
and CLASSPATH:: "CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%"
i copyied and pasted so thats exactly what i'm currently useing well not really useing cuz its not working. PLZ help any advice at all would be much appreciated!!!!
Thank you for your time, z6x7c8.

item.title: Need variable help! PLZ!

item.description:
@z6x7c8 wrote:

k i’ll try that now.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 17, 2008, 11:00:29 AM[/size][hr]man its still saying that i need to get JDK!!! resarting didnt work.

item.title: Need variable help! PLZ!
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

JUst change PATH to “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin”

and CLASSPATH to “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin”

And on "user variable for (your username)

go on PATH or create it and make it “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin”

Read full topic

item.title: Need variable help! PLZ!

item.description:
@z6x7c8 wrote:

ive seen tons of people post on this matter and ive tried tons of tut’s but its just not working! i have JDK 6 update 6 i’ve re-installed it just now for the 4rth time but thats didnt fix it ive tried tons of difern’t varibles that people said should work but sofar nothing has when i compile the server it says that i need to get JDK 5.0 or 6.0 or higher and to go to mod thoraks tut on this site. i already have JDK so why does it say i need to dowload it? ive tried other JDK versions besides 6 update 6 but still no luck.
